after.name: after
after.short_desc: Get the portion of a string after the first occurrence of a given value.

ascii.name: ascii
ascii.short_desc: Convert a string to its ASCII representation.

before.name: before
before.short_desc: Get the portion of a string before the first occurrence of a given value.

between.name: between
between.short_desc: Get the substring between two given substrings.

contains.name: contains
contains.short_desc: Determine if a string contains a given substring.

crc32.name: crc32
crc32.short_desc: Calculate CRC32 hash of a string.

endsWith.name: endsWith
endsWith.short_desc: Determine if a string ends with a given substring.

excerpt.name: excerpt
excerpt.short_desc: Create excerpts around specific words within a string.

radius.name: radius
radius.short_desc: The number of characters around the phrase.

finish.name: finish
finish.short_desc: Ensure a string ends with a given value.

cap.name: cap
cap.short_desc: The ending string to append if missing.

headline.name: headline
headline.short_desc: Convert a string to headline case.

isAscii.name: isAscii
isAscii.short_desc: Check if the given string is pure ASCII.

isEmpty.name: isEmpty
isEmpty.short_desc: Determine if a string is empty.

isJson.name: isJson
isJson.short_desc: Determine if a string is a valid JSON.

isUuid.name: isUuid
isUuid.short_desc: Check if a string is a valid UUID.

lastPosition.short_desc: Find the position of the last occurrence of a substring.

lcfirst.name: lcfirst
lcfirst.short_desc: Converts the first character of a string to lowercase.
lcfirst.hint_desc: The string with the first character converted to lowercase.

length.name: length
length.short_desc: Get the length of a string using multibyte support.

levenshtein.name: levenshtein
levenshtein.short_desc: Calculate Levenshtein distance between two strings.

limit.name: limit
limit.short_desc: Limit the number of characters in a string.

mask.name: mask
mask.short_desc: Mask portions of a string with a given character.

length.name: length
length.short_desc: The number of characters to mask.

md5.name: md5
md5.short_desc: Return the MD5 hash of a string.

numberFormat.name: numberFormat
numberFormat.short_desc: Format a number with grouped thousands.

padLeft.name: padLeft
padLeft.short_desc: Pad the left side of a string with a given character.

length.name: length
length.short_desc: The desired total length after padding.

padRight.name: padRight
padRight.short_desc: Pad the right side of a string with a given character.

length.name: length
length.short_desc: The desired total length after padding.

count.name: count
count.short_desc: The number to determine singular or plural.

position.name: position
position.short_desc: Find the position of the first occurrence of a substring.

random.name: random
random.short_desc: Generate a random string of a specified length.

length.name: length
length.short_desc: The desired length of the random string.

replace.name: replace
replace.short_desc: Replace all occurrences of the search string with the replacement string.

subject.name: subject
subject.short_desc: The string being searched and replaced on.

replaceArray.name: replaceArray
replaceArray.short_desc: Replace placeholders sequentially with values from an array.

subject.name: subject
subject.short_desc: The string to perform replacements on.

replaceFirst.name: replaceFirst
replaceFirst.short_desc: Replace the first occurrence of a substring.

subject.name: subject
subject.short_desc: The string to perform replacement on.

replaceLast.name: replaceLast
replaceLast.short_desc: Replace the last occurrence of a substring.

subject.name: subject
subject.short_desc: The string to perform replacement on.

replaceMultiple.name: replaceMultiple
replaceMultiple.short_desc: Replace multiple occurrences of different values in a string.

subject.name: subject
subject.short_desc: The string to perform replacements on.

sha1.name: sha1
sha1.short_desc: Return the SHA1 hash of a string.

delimiter.name: delimiter
delimiter.short_desc: The delimiter used for snake casing.

slug.name: slug
slug.short_desc: Convert a string to a URL-friendly slug.

separator.name: separator
separator.short_desc: The separator used in the slug.

squish.name: squish
squish.short_desc: Remove excessive whitespace from a string.

startsWith.name: startsWith
startsWith.short_desc: Determine if a string starts with a given substring.

stripWhitespace.name: stripWhitespace
stripWhitespace.short_desc: Strip all whitespace from a string.

substr.name: substr
substr.short_desc: Get a part of a string.

length.name: length
length.short_desc: The number of characters to extract.

swapKeyValue.name: swapKeyValue
swapKeyValue.short_desc: Swap keys with values in an array and return as a string.

title.name: title
title.short_desc: Convert a string to title case.

toArray.name: toArray
toArray.short_desc: Convert a string into an array.

ucfirst.name: ucfirst
ucfirst.short_desc: Capitalize the first character of a string.

ucwords.name: ucwords
ucwords.short_desc: Capitalize the first letter of each word.

wordCount.name: wordCount
wordCount.short_desc: Count the number of words in a string.

words.name: words

words.short_desc: Number of words to limit to.
